view.name: vStoreWithContacts
view.description: Stores (including store contacts) that sell Adventure Works Cycles products to consumers.

view.name: vStoreWithAddresses
view.description: Stores (including store addresses) that sell Adventure Works Cycles products to consumers.

table.name: ShoppingCartItem
table.description: Contains online customer orders until the order is submitted or cancelled.

field.name: ShoppingCartItemID
field.description: Primary key for ShoppingCartItem records.

field.name: ShoppingCartID
field.description: Shopping cart identification number.

field.name: Quantity
field.description: Product quantity ordered.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product ordered. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: DateCreated
field.description: Date the time the record was created.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: SpecialOffer
table.description: Sale discounts lookup table.

field.name: SpecialOfferID
field.description: Primary key for SpecialOffer records.

field.name: Description
field.description: Discount description.

field.name: DiscountPct
field.description: Discount precentage.

field.name: Type
field.description: Discount type category.

field.name: Category
field.description: Group the discount applies to such as Reseller or Customer.

field.name: StartDate
field.description: Discount start date.

field.name: EndDate
field.description: Discount end date.

field.name: MinQty
field.description: Minimum discount percent allowed.

field.name: MaxQty
field.description: Maximum discount percent allowed.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: SpecialOfferProduct
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping products to special offer discounts.

field.name: SpecialOfferID
field.description: Primary key for SpecialOfferProduct records.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Store
table.description: Customers (resellers) of Adventure Works products.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to Customer.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: Name
field.description: Name of the store.

field.name: SalesPersonID
field.description: ID of the sales person assigned to the customer. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: Demographics
field.description: Demographic informationg about the store such as the number of employees, annual sales and store type.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: CountryRegionCurrency
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping ISO currency codes to a country or region.

field.name: CountryRegionCode
field.description: ISO code for countries and regions. Foreign key to CountryRegion.CountryRegionCode.

field.name: CurrencyCode
field.description: ISO standard currency code. Foreign key to Currency.CurrencyCode.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: CreditCard
table.description: Customer credit card information.

field.name: CreditCardID
field.description: Primary key for CreditCard records.

field.name: CardType
field.description: Credit card name.

field.name: CardNumber
field.description: Credit card number.

field.name: ExpMonth
field.description: Credit card expiration month.

field.name: ExpYear
field.description: Credit card expiration year.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Currency
table.description: Lookup table containing standard ISO currencies.

field.name: CurrencyCode
field.description: The ISO code for the Currency.

field.name: Name
field.description: Currency name.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: CurrencyRate
table.description: Currency exchange rates.

field.name: CurrencyRateID
field.description: Primary key for CurrencyRate records.

field.name: CurrencyRateDate
field.description: Date and time the exchange rate was obtained.

field.name: FromCurrencyCode
field.description: Exchange rate was converted from this currency code.

field.name: ToCurrencyCode
field.description: Exchange rate was converted to this currency code.

field.name: AverageRate
field.description: Average exchange rate for the day.

field.name: EndOfDayRate
field.description: Final exchange rate for the day.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Customer
table.description: Current customer information. Also see the Person and Store tables.

field.name: CustomerID
field.description: Primary key.

field.name: PersonID
field.description: Foreign key to Person.BusinessEntityID

field.name: StoreID
field.description: Foreign key to Store.BusinessEntityID

field.name: TerritoryID
field.description: ID of the territory in which the customer is located. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

field.name: AccountNumber
field.description: Unique number identifying the customer assigned by the accounting system.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: SalesOrderDetail
table.description: Individual products associated with a specific sales order. See SalesOrderHeader.

field.name: SalesOrderID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderID.

field.name: SalesOrderDetailID
field.description: Primary key. One incremental unique number per product sold.

field.name: CarrierTrackingNumber
field.description: Shipment tracking number supplied by the shipper.

field.name: OrderQty
field.description: Quantity ordered per product.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product sold to customer. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: SpecialOfferID
field.description: Promotional code. Foreign key to SpecialOffer.SpecialOfferID.

field.name: UnitPrice
field.description: Selling price of a single product.

field.name: UnitPriceDiscount
field.description: Discount amount.

field.name: LineTotal
field.description: Per product subtotal. Computed as UnitPrice * (1 - UnitPriceDiscount) * OrderQty.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: SalesOrderHeader
table.description: General sales order information.

field.name: SalesOrderID
field.description: Primary key.

field.name: RevisionNumber
field.description: Incremental number to track changes to the sales order over time.

field.name: OrderDate
field.description: Dates the sales order was created.

field.name: DueDate
field.description: Date the order is due to the customer.

field.name: ShipDate
field.description: Date the order was shipped to the customer.

field.name: Status
field.description: Order current status. 1 = In process; 2 = Approved; 3 = Backordered; 4 = Rejected; 5 = Shipped; 6 = Cancelled

field.name: OnlineOrderFlag
field.description: 0 = Order placed by sales person. 1 = Order placed online by customer.

field.name: SalesOrderNumber
field.description: Unique sales order identification number.

field.name: PurchaseOrderNumber
field.description: Customer purchase order number reference.

field.name: AccountNumber
field.description: Financial accounting number reference.

field.name: CustomerID
field.description: Customer identification number. Foreign key to Customer.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: SalesPersonID
field.description: Sales person who created the sales order. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: TerritoryID
field.description: Territory in which the sale was made. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

field.name: BillToAddressID
field.description: Customer billing address. Foreign key to Address.AddressID.

field.name: ShipToAddressID
field.description: Customer shipping address. Foreign key to Address.AddressID.

field.name: ShipMethodID
field.description: Shipping method. Foreign key to ShipMethod.ShipMethodID.

field.name: CreditCardID
field.description: Credit card identification number. Foreign key to CreditCard.CreditCardID.

field.name: CreditCardApprovalCode
field.description: Approval code provided by the credit card company.

field.name: CurrencyRateID
field.description: Currency exchange rate used. Foreign key to CurrencyRate.CurrencyRateID.

field.name: SubTotal
field.description: Sales subtotal. Computed as SUM(SalesOrderDetail.LineTotal)for the appropriate SalesOrderID.

field.name: TaxAmt
field.description: Tax amount.

field.name: Freight
field.description: Shipping cost.

field.name: TotalDue
field.description: Total due from customer. Computed as Subtotal + TaxAmt + Freight.

field.name: Comment
field.description: Sales representative comments.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: SalesOrderHeaderSalesReason
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping sales orders to sales reason codes.

field.name: SalesOrderID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderID.

field.name: SalesReasonID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to SalesReason.SalesReasonID.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: SalesPerson
table.description: Sales representative current information.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key for SalesPerson records. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID

field.name: TerritoryID
field.description: Territory currently assigned to. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

field.name: SalesQuota
field.description: Projected yearly sales.

field.name: Bonus
field.description: Bonus due if quota is met.

field.name: CommissionPct
field.description: Commision percent received per sale.

field.name: SalesYTD
field.description: Sales total year to date.

field.name: SalesLastYear
field.description: Sales total of previous year.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: SalesPersonQuotaHistory
table.description: Sales performance tracking.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Sales person identification number. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: QuotaDate
field.description: Sales quota date.

field.name: SalesQuota
field.description: Sales quota amount.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: SalesReason
table.description: Lookup table of customer purchase reasons.

field.name: SalesReasonID
field.description: Primary key for SalesReason records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Sales reason description.

field.name: ReasonType
field.description: Category the sales reason belongs to.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: SalesTaxRate
table.description: Tax rate lookup table.

field.name: SalesTaxRateID
field.description: Primary key for SalesTaxRate records.

field.name: StateProvinceID
field.description: State, province, or country/region the sales tax applies to.

field.name: TaxType
field.description: 1 = Tax applied to retail transactions, 2 = Tax applied to wholesale transactions, 3 = Tax applied to all sales (retail and wholesale) transactions.

field.name: TaxRate
field.description: Tax rate amount.

field.name: Name
field.description: Tax rate description.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: PersonCreditCard
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping people to their credit card information in the CreditCard table.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Business entity identification number. Foreign key to Person.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: CreditCardID
field.description: Credit card identification number. Foreign key to CreditCard.CreditCardID.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: SalesTerritory
table.description: Sales territory lookup table.

field.name: TerritoryID
field.description: Primary key for SalesTerritory records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Sales territory description

field.name: CountryRegionCode
field.description: ISO standard country or region code. Foreign key to CountryRegion.CountryRegionCode.

field.name: Group
field.description: Geographic area to which the sales territory belong.

field.name: SalesYTD
field.description: Sales in the territory year to date.

field.name: SalesLastYear
field.description: Sales in the territory the previous year.

field.name: CostYTD
field.description: Business costs in the territory year to date.

field.name: CostLastYear
field.description: Business costs in the territory the previous year.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

view.name: vIndividualCustomer
view.description: Individual customers (names and addresses) that purchase Adventure Works Cycles products online.

view.name: vPersonDemographics
view.description: Displays the content from each element in the xml column Demographics for each customer in the Person.Person table.

view.name: vSalesPerson
view.description: Sales representiatives (names and addresses) and their sales-related information.

table.name: SalesTerritoryHistory
table.description: Sales representative transfers to other sales territories.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key. The sales rep. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: TerritoryID
field.description: Primary key. Territory identification number. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

field.name: StartDate
field.description: Primary key. Date the sales representive started work in the territory.

field.name: EndDate
field.description: Date the sales representative left work in the territory.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

view.name: vSalesPersonSalesByFiscalYears
view.description: Uses PIVOT to return aggregated sales information for each sales representative.

view.name: vStoreWithDemographics
view.description: Stores (including demographics) that sell Adventure Works Cycles products to consumers.

table.name: Address
table.description: Street address information for customers, employees, and vendors.

field.name: AddressID
field.description: Primary key for Address records.

field.name: AddressLine1
field.description: First street address line.

field.name: AddressLine2
field.description: Second street address line.

field.name: City
field.description: Name of the city.

field.name: StateProvinceID
field.description: Unique identification number for the state or province. Foreign key to StateProvince table.

field.name: PostalCode
field.description: Postal code for the street address.

field.name: SpatialLocation
field.description: Latitude and longitude of this address.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: AddressType
table.description: Types of addresses stored in the Address table.

field.name: AddressTypeID
field.description: Primary key for AddressType records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Address type description. For example, Billing, Home, or Shipping.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: StateProvince
table.description: State and province lookup table.

field.name: StateProvinceID
field.description: Primary key for StateProvince records.

field.name: StateProvinceCode
field.description: ISO standard state or province code.

field.name: CountryRegionCode
field.description: ISO standard country or region code. Foreign key to CountryRegion.CountryRegionCode.

field.name: IsOnlyStateProvinceFlag
field.description: 0 = StateProvinceCode exists. 1 = StateProvinceCode unavailable, using CountryRegionCode.

field.name: Name
field.description: State or province description.

field.name: TerritoryID
field.description: ID of the territory in which the state or province is located. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: BusinessEntity
table.description: Source of the ID that connects vendors, customers, and employees with address and contact information.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key for all customers, vendors, and employees.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: BusinessEntityAddress
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping customers, vendors, and employees to their addresses.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to BusinessEntity.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: AddressID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to Address.AddressID.

field.name: AddressTypeID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to AddressType.AddressTypeID.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: BusinessEntityContact
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping stores, vendors, and employees to people

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to BusinessEntity.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: PersonID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to Person.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: ContactTypeID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to ContactType.ContactTypeID.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ContactType
table.description: Lookup table containing the types of business entity contacts.

field.name: ContactTypeID
field.description: Primary key for ContactType records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Contact type description.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: CountryRegion
table.description: Lookup table containing the ISO standard codes for countries and regions.

field.name: CountryRegionCode
field.description: ISO standard code for countries and regions.

field.name: Name
field.description: Country or region name.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: EmailAddress
table.description: Where to send a person email.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key. Person associated with this email address. Foreign key to Person.BusinessEntityID

field.name: EmailAddressID
field.description: Primary key. ID of this email address.

field.name: EmailAddress
field.description: E-mail address for the person.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Password
table.description: One way hashed authentication information

field.name: PasswordHash
field.description: Password for the e-mail account.

field.name: PasswordSalt
field.description: Random value concatenated with the password string before the password is hashed.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Person
table.description: Human beings involved with AdventureWorks: employees, customer contacts, and vendor contacts.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key for Person records.

field.name: PersonType
field.description: Primary type of person: SC = Store Contact, IN = Individual (retail) customer, SP = Sales person, EM = Employee (non-sales), VC = Vendor contact, GC = General contact

field.name: NameStyle
field.description: 0 = The data in FirstName and LastName are stored in western style (first name, last name) order. 1 = Eastern style (last name, first name) order.

field.name: Title
field.description: A courtesy title. For example, Mr. or Ms.

field.name: FirstName
field.description: First name of the person.

field.name: MiddleName
field.description: Middle name or middle initial of the person.

field.name: LastName
field.description: Last name of the person.

field.name: Suffix
field.description: Surname suffix. For example, Sr. or Jr.

field.name: EmailPromotion
field.description: 0 = Contact does not wish to receive e-mail promotions, 1 = Contact does wish to receive e-mail promotions from AdventureWorks, 2 = Contact does wish to receive e-mail promotions from AdventureWorks and selected partners.

field.name: AdditionalContactInfo
field.description: Additional contact information about the person stored in xml format.

field.name: Demographics
field.description: Personal information such as hobbies, and income collected from online shoppers. Used for sales analysis.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

view.name: vAdditionalContactInfo
view.description: Displays the contact name and content from each element in the xml column AdditionalContactInfo for that person.

table.name: PersonPhone
table.description: Telephone number and type of a person.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Business entity identification number. Foreign key to Person.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: PhoneNumber
field.description: Telephone number identification number.

field.name: PhoneNumberTypeID
field.description: Kind of phone number. Foreign key to PhoneNumberType.PhoneNumberTypeID.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: PhoneNumberType
table.description: Type of phone number of a person.

field.name: PhoneNumberTypeID
field.description: Primary key for telephone number type records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Name of the telephone number type

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

view.name: vStateProvinceCountryRegion
view.description: Joins StateProvince table with CountryRegion table.

table.name: ScrapReason
table.description: Manufacturing failure reasons lookup table.

field.name: ScrapReasonID
field.description: Primary key for ScrapReason records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Failure description.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductCategory
table.description: High-level product categorization.

field.name: ProductCategoryID
field.description: Primary key for ProductCategory records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Category description.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductCostHistory
table.description: Changes in the cost of a product over time.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID

field.name: StartDate
field.description: Product cost start date.

field.name: EndDate
field.description: Product cost end date.

field.name: StandardCost
field.description: Standard cost of the product.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductDescription
table.description: Product descriptions in several languages.

field.name: ProductDescriptionID
field.description: Primary key for ProductDescription records.

field.name: Description
field.description: Description of the product.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductDocument
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping products to related product documents.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: DocumentNode
field.description: Document identification number. Foreign key to Document.DocumentNode.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductInventory
table.description: Product inventory information.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: LocationID
field.description: Inventory location identification number. Foreign key to Location.LocationID.

field.name: Shelf
field.description: Storage compartment within an inventory location.

field.name: Bin
field.description: Storage container on a shelf in an inventory location.

field.name: Quantity
field.description: Quantity of products in the inventory location.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductListPriceHistory
table.description: Changes in the list price of a product over time.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID

field.name: StartDate
field.description: List price start date.

field.name: EndDate
field.description: List price end date

field.name: ListPrice
field.description: Product list price.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductModel
table.description: Product model classification.

field.name: ProductModelID
field.description: Primary key for ProductModel records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Product model description.

field.name: CatalogDescription
field.description: Detailed product catalog information in xml format.

field.name: Instructions
field.description: Manufacturing instructions in xml format.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

table.name: ProductModelIllustration
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping product models and illustrations.

field.name: ProductModelID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to ProductModel.ProductModelID.

field.name: IllustrationID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to Illustration.IllustrationID.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductModelProductDescriptionCulture
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping product descriptions and the language the description is written in.

field.name: ProductModelID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to ProductModel.ProductModelID.

field.name: ProductDescriptionID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to ProductDescription.ProductDescriptionID.

field.name: CultureID
field.description: Culture identification number. Foreign key to Culture.CultureID.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: BillOfMaterials
table.description: Items required to make bicycles and bicycle subassemblies. It identifies the heirarchical relationship between a parent product and its components.

field.name: BillOfMaterialsID
field.description: Primary key for BillOfMaterials records.

field.name: ProductAssemblyID
field.description: Parent product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: ComponentID
field.description: Component identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: StartDate
field.description: Date the component started being used in the assembly item.

field.name: EndDate
field.description: Date the component stopped being used in the assembly item.

field.name: UnitMeasureCode
field.description: Standard code identifying the unit of measure for the quantity.

field.name: BOMLevel
field.description: Indicates the depth the component is from its parent (AssemblyID).

field.name: PerAssemblyQty
field.description: Quantity of the component needed to create the assembly.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductPhoto
table.description: Product images.

field.name: ProductPhotoID
field.description: Primary key for ProductPhoto records.

field.name: ThumbNailPhoto
field.description: Small image of the product.

field.name: ThumbnailPhotoFileName
field.description: Small image file name.

field.name: LargePhoto
field.description: Large image of the product.

field.name: LargePhotoFileName
field.description: Large image file name.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductProductPhoto
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping products and product photos.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: ProductPhotoID
field.description: Product photo identification number. Foreign key to ProductPhoto.ProductPhotoID.

field.name: Primary
field.description: 0 = Photo is not the principal image. 1 = Photo is the principal image.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: TransactionHistory
table.description: Record of each purchase order, sales order, or work order transaction year to date.

field.name: TransactionID
field.description: Primary key for TransactionHistory records.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: ReferenceOrderID
field.description: Purchase order, sales order, or work order identification number.

field.name: ReferenceOrderLineID
field.description: Line number associated with the purchase order, sales order, or work order.

field.name: TransactionDate
field.description: Date and time of the transaction.

field.name: TransactionType
field.description: W = WorkOrder, S = SalesOrder, P = PurchaseOrder

field.name: Quantity
field.description: Product quantity.

field.name: ActualCost
field.description: Product cost.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductReview
table.description: Customer reviews of products they have purchased.

field.name: ProductReviewID
field.description: Primary key for ProductReview records.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: ReviewerName
field.description: Name of the reviewer.

field.name: ReviewDate
field.description: Date review was submitted.

field.name: EmailAddress
field.description: Reviewer's e-mail address.

field.name: Rating
field.description: Product rating given by the reviewer. Scale is 1 to 5 with 5 as the highest rating.

field.name: Comments
field.description: Reviewer's comments

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: TransactionHistoryArchive
table.description: Transactions for previous years.

field.name: TransactionID
field.description: Primary key for TransactionHistoryArchive records.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: ReferenceOrderID
field.description: Purchase order, sales order, or work order identification number.

field.name: ReferenceOrderLineID
field.description: Line number associated with the purchase order, sales order, or work order.

field.name: TransactionDate
field.description: Date and time of the transaction.

field.name: TransactionType
field.description: W = Work Order, S = Sales Order, P = Purchase Order

field.name: Quantity
field.description: Product quantity.

field.name: ActualCost
field.description: Product cost.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductSubcategory
table.description: Product subcategories. See ProductCategory table.

field.name: ProductSubcategoryID
field.description: Primary key for ProductSubcategory records.

field.name: ProductCategoryID
field.description: Product category identification number. Foreign key to ProductCategory.ProductCategoryID.

field.name: Name
field.description: Subcategory description.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: UnitMeasure
table.description: Unit of measure lookup table.

field.name: UnitMeasureCode
field.description: Primary key.

field.name: Name
field.description: Unit of measure description.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: WorkOrder
table.description: Manufacturing work orders.

field.name: WorkOrderID
field.description: Primary key for WorkOrder records.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: OrderQty
field.description: Product quantity to build.

field.name: StockedQty
field.description: Quantity built and put in inventory.

field.name: ScrappedQty
field.description: Quantity that failed inspection.

field.name: StartDate
field.description: Work order start date.

field.name: EndDate
field.description: Work order end date.

field.name: DueDate
field.description: Work order due date.

field.name: ScrapReasonID
field.description: Reason for inspection failure.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Culture
table.description: Lookup table containing the languages in which some AdventureWorks data is stored.

field.name: CultureID
field.description: Primary key for Culture records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Culture description.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: WorkOrderRouting
table.description: Work order details.

field.name: WorkOrderID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to WorkOrder.WorkOrderID.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: OperationSequence
field.description: Primary key. Indicates the manufacturing process sequence.

field.name: LocationID
field.description: Manufacturing location where the part is processed. Foreign key to Location.LocationID.

field.name: ScheduledStartDate
field.description: Planned manufacturing start date.

field.name: ScheduledEndDate
field.description: Planned manufacturing end date.

field.name: ActualStartDate
field.description: Actual start date.

field.name: ActualEndDate
field.description: Actual end date.

field.name: ActualResourceHrs
field.description: Number of manufacturing hours used.

field.name: PlannedCost
field.description: Estimated manufacturing cost.

field.name: ActualCost
field.description: Actual manufacturing cost.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Document
table.description: Product maintenance documents.

field.name: DocumentNode
field.description: Primary key for Document records.

field.name: DocumentLevel
field.description: Depth in the document hierarchy.

field.name: Title
field.description: Title of the document.

field.name: Owner
field.description: Employee who controls the document. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID

field.name: FolderFlag
field.description: 0 = This is a folder, 1 = This is a document.

field.name: FileName
field.description: File name of the document

field.name: FileExtension
field.description: File extension indicating the document type. For example, .doc or .txt.

field.name: Revision
field.description: Revision number of the document.

field.name: ChangeNumber
field.description: Engineering change approval number.

field.name: Status
field.description: 1 = Pending approval, 2 = Approved, 3 = Obsolete

field.name: DocumentSummary
field.description: Document abstract.

field.name: Document
field.description: Complete document.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Required for FileStream.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Illustration
table.description: Bicycle assembly diagrams.

field.name: IllustrationID
field.description: Primary key for Illustration records.

field.name: Diagram
field.description: Illustrations used in manufacturing instructions. Stored as XML.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Location
table.description: Product inventory and manufacturing locations.

field.name: LocationID
field.description: Primary key for Location records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Location description.

field.name: CostRate
field.description: Standard hourly cost of the manufacturing location.

field.name: Availability
field.description: Work capacity (in hours) of the manufacturing location.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Product
table.description: Products sold or used in the manfacturing of sold products.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Primary key for Product records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Name of the product.

field.name: ProductNumber
field.description: Unique product identification number.

field.name: MakeFlag
field.description: 0 = Product is purchased, 1 = Product is manufactured in-house.

field.name: FinishedGoodsFlag
field.description: 0 = Product is not a salable item. 1 = Product is salable.

field.name: Color
field.description: Product color.

field.name: SafetyStockLevel
field.description: Minimum inventory quantity.

field.name: ReorderPoint
field.description: Inventory level that triggers a purchase order or work order.

field.name: StandardCost
field.description: Standard cost of the product.

field.name: ListPrice
field.description: Selling price.

field.name: Size
field.description: Product size.

field.name: SizeUnitMeasureCode
field.description: Unit of measure for Size column.

field.name: WeightUnitMeasureCode
field.description: Unit of measure for Weight column.

field.name: Weight
field.description: Product weight.

field.name: DaysToManufacture
field.description: Number of days required to manufacture the product.

field.name: ProductLine
field.description: R = Road, M = Mountain, T = Touring, S = Standard

field.name: Class
field.description: H = High, M = Medium, L = Low

field.name: Style
field.description: W = Womens, M = Mens, U = Universal

field.name: ProductSubcategoryID
field.description: Product is a member of this product subcategory. Foreign key to ProductSubCategory.ProductSubCategoryID.

field.name: ProductModelID
field.description: Product is a member of this product model. Foreign key to ProductModel.ProductModelID.

field.name: SellStartDate
field.description: Date the product was available for sale.

field.name: SellEndDate
field.description: Date the product was no longer available for sale.

field.name: DiscontinuedDate
field.description: Date the product was discontinued.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

view.name: vProductAndDescription
view.description: Product names and descriptions. Product descriptions are provided in multiple languages.

view.name: vProductModelCatalogDescription
view.description: Displays the content from each element in the xml column CatalogDescription for each product in the Production.ProductModel table that has catalog data.

view.name: vProductModelInstructions
view.description: Displays the content from each element in the xml column Instructions for each product in the Production.ProductModel table that has manufacturing instructions.

table.name: DatabaseLog
table.description: Audit table tracking all DDL changes made to the AdventureWorks database. Data is captured by the database trigger ddlDatabaseTriggerLog.

field.name: DatabaseLogID
field.description: Primary key for DatabaseLog records.

field.name: PostTime
field.description: The date and time the DDL change occurred.

field.name: DatabaseUser
field.description: The user who implemented the DDL change.

field.name: Event
field.description: The type of DDL statement that was executed.

field.name: Schema
field.description: The schema to which the changed object belongs.

field.name: Object
field.description: The object that was changed by the DDL statment.

field.name: TSQL
field.description: The exact Transact-SQL statement that was executed.

field.name: XmlEvent
field.description: The raw XML data generated by database trigger.

table.name: ErrorLog
table.description: Audit table tracking errors in the the AdventureWorks database that are caught by the CATCH block of a TRY...CATCH construct. Data is inserted by stored procedure dbo.uspLogError when it is executed from inside the CATCH block of a TRY...CATCH construct.

field.name: ErrorLogID
field.description: Primary key for ErrorLog records.

field.name: ErrorTime
field.description: The date and time at which the error occurred.

field.name: UserName
field.description: The user who executed the batch in which the error occurred.

field.name: ErrorNumber
field.description: The error number of the error that occurred.

field.name: ErrorSeverity
field.description: The severity of the error that occurred.

field.name: ErrorState
field.description: The state number of the error that occurred.

field.name: ErrorProcedure
field.description: The name of the stored procedure or trigger where the error occurred.

field.name: ErrorLine
field.description: The line number at which the error occurred.

field.name: ErrorMessage
field.description: The message text of the error that occurred.

table.name: AWBuildVersion
table.description: Current version number of the AdventureWorks 2014 sample database.

field.name: SystemInformationID
field.description: Primary key for AWBuildVersion records.

field.name: Database Version
field.description: Version number of the database in 9.yy.mm.dd.00 format.

field.name: VersionDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Shift
table.description: Work shift lookup table.

field.name: ShiftID
field.description: Primary key for Shift records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Shift description.

field.name: StartTime
field.description: Shift start time.

field.name: EndTime
field.description: Shift end time.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Department
table.description: Lookup table containing the departments within the Adventure Works Cycles company.

field.name: DepartmentID
field.description: Primary key for Department records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Name of the department.

field.name: GroupName
field.description: Name of the group to which the department belongs.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Employee
table.description: Employee information such as salary, department, and title.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key for Employee records. Foreign key to BusinessEntity.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: NationalIDNumber
field.description: Unique national identification number such as a social security number.

field.name: LoginID
field.description: Network login.

field.name: OrganizationNode
field.description: Where the employee is located in corporate hierarchy.

field.name: OrganizationLevel
field.description: The depth of the employee in the corporate hierarchy.

field.name: JobTitle
field.description: Work title such as Buyer or Sales Representative.

field.name: BirthDate
field.description: Date of birth.

field.name: MaritalStatus
field.description: M = Married, S = Single

field.name: Gender
field.description: M = Male, F = Female

field.name: HireDate
field.description: Employee hired on this date.

field.name: SalariedFlag
field.description: Job classification. 0 = Hourly, not exempt from collective bargaining. 1 = Salaried, exempt from collective bargaining.

field.name: VacationHours
field.description: Number of available vacation hours.

field.name: SickLeaveHours
field.description: Number of available sick leave hours.

field.name: CurrentFlag
field.description: 0 = Inactive, 1 = Active

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: EmployeeDepartmentHistory
table.description: Employee department transfers.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Employee identification number. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: DepartmentID
field.description: Department in which the employee worked including currently. Foreign key to Department.DepartmentID.

field.name: ShiftID
field.description: Identifies which 8-hour shift the employee works. Foreign key to Shift.Shift.ID.

field.name: StartDate
field.description: Date the employee started work in the department.

field.name: EndDate
field.description: Date the employee left the department. NULL = Current department.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: EmployeePayHistory
table.description: Employee pay history.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Employee identification number. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: RateChangeDate
field.description: Date the change in pay is effective

field.name: Rate
field.description: Salary hourly rate.

field.name: PayFrequency
field.description: 1 = Salary received monthly, 2 = Salary received biweekly

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: JobCandidate
table.description: Résumés submitted to Human Resources by job applicants.

field.name: JobCandidateID
field.description: Primary key for JobCandidate records.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Employee identification number if applicant was hired. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: Resume
field.description: Résumé in XML format.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

view.name: vEmployee
view.description: Employee names and addresses.

view.name: vEmployeeDepartment
view.description: Returns employee name, title, and current department.

view.name: vEmployeeDepartmentHistory
view.description: Returns employee name and current and previous departments.

view.name: vJobCandidate
view.description: Job candidate names and resumes.

view.name: vJobCandidateEmployment
view.description: Displays the content from each employement history related element in the xml column Resume in the HumanResources.JobCandidate table. The content has been localized into French, Simplified Chinese and Thai. Some data may not display correctly unless supplemental language support is installed.

view.name: vJobCandidateEducation
view.description: Displays the content from each education related element in the xml column Resume in the HumanResources.JobCandidate table. The content has been localized into French, Simplified Chinese and Thai. Some data may not display correctly unless supplemental language support is installed.

view.name: vVendorWithContacts
view.description: Vendor (company) names and the names of vendor employees to contact.

view.name: vVendorWithAddresses
view.description: Vendor (company) names and addresses .

table.name: ShipMethod
table.description: Shipping company lookup table.

field.name: ShipMethodID
field.description: Primary key for ShipMethod records.

field.name: Name
field.description: Shipping company name.

field.name: ShipBase
field.description: Minimum shipping charge.

field.name: ShipRate
field.description: Shipping charge per pound.

field.name: rowguid
field.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: ProductVendor
table.description: Cross-reference table mapping vendors with the products they supply.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to Vendor.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: AverageLeadTime
field.description: The average span of time (in days) between placing an order with the vendor and receiving the purchased product.

field.name: StandardPrice
field.description: The vendor's usual selling price.

field.name: LastReceiptCost
field.description: The selling price when last purchased.

field.name: LastReceiptDate
field.description: Date the product was last received by the vendor.

field.name: MinOrderQty
field.description: The maximum quantity that should be ordered.

field.name: MaxOrderQty
field.description: The minimum quantity that should be ordered.

field.name: OnOrderQty
field.description: The quantity currently on order.

field.name: UnitMeasureCode
field.description: The product's unit of measure.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: Vendor
table.description: Companies from whom Adventure Works Cycles purchases parts or other goods.

field.name: BusinessEntityID
field.description: Primary key for Vendor records. Foreign key to BusinessEntity.BusinessEntityID

field.name: AccountNumber
field.description: Vendor account (identification) number.

field.name: Name
field.description: Company name.

field.name: CreditRating
field.description: 1 = Superior, 2 = Excellent, 3 = Above average, 4 = Average, 5 = Below average

field.name: PreferredVendorStatus
field.description: 0 = Do not use if another vendor is available. 1 = Preferred over other vendors supplying the same product.

field.name: ActiveFlag
field.description: 0 = Vendor no longer used. 1 = Vendor is actively used.

field.name: PurchasingWebServiceURL
field.description: Vendor URL.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: PurchaseOrderDetail
table.description: Individual products associated with a specific purchase order. See PurchaseOrderHeader.

field.name: PurchaseOrderID
field.description: Primary key. Foreign key to PurchaseOrderHeader.PurchaseOrderID.

field.name: PurchaseOrderDetailID
field.description: Primary key. One line number per purchased product.

field.name: DueDate
field.description: Date the product is expected to be received.

field.name: OrderQty
field.description: Quantity ordered.

field.name: ProductID
field.description: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

field.name: UnitPrice
field.description: Vendor's selling price of a single product.

field.name: LineTotal
field.description: Per product subtotal. Computed as OrderQty * UnitPrice.

field.name: ReceivedQty
field.description: Quantity actually received from the vendor.

field.name: RejectedQty
field.description: Quantity rejected during inspection.

field.name: StockedQty
field.description: Quantity accepted into inventory. Computed as ReceivedQty - RejectedQty.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

table.name: PurchaseOrderHeader
table.description: General purchase order information. See PurchaseOrderDetail.

field.name: PurchaseOrderID
field.description: Primary key.

field.name: RevisionNumber
field.description: Incremental number to track changes to the purchase order over time.

field.name: Status
field.description: Order current status. 1 = Pending; 2 = Approved; 3 = Rejected; 4 = Complete

field.name: EmployeeID
field.description: Employee who created the purchase order. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: VendorID
field.description: Vendor with whom the purchase order is placed. Foreign key to Vendor.BusinessEntityID.

field.name: ShipMethodID
field.description: Shipping method. Foreign key to ShipMethod.ShipMethodID.

field.name: OrderDate
field.description: Purchase order creation date.

field.name: ShipDate
field.description: Estimated shipment date from the vendor.

field.name: SubTotal
field.description: Purchase order subtotal. Computed as SUM(PurchaseOrderDetail.LineTotal)for the appropriate PurchaseOrderID.

field.name: TaxAmt
field.description: Tax amount.

field.name: Freight
field.description: Shipping cost.

field.name: TotalDue
field.description: Total due to vendor. Computed as Subtotal + TaxAmt + Freight.

field.name: ModifiedDate
field.description: Date and time the record was last updated.
